faq.question: What is Flash?
faq.answer: Flash is a secure and easy-to-use app that lets you to receive, save, and spend digital cash instantly and globally. It's designed for consumers and businesses, enabling everyone to participate in the global economy.

faq.question: How do I get Flash?
faq.answer:
Flash is available on iOS, Android, and as an APK file. You can also access the Flash Point of Sale Cash Register as a Progressive Web Application (PWA) through your web browser.

Visit our Download section and click on the link specific to your device.

faq.question: Is it safe to use Flash? How secure is it?
faq.answer:
Flash uses ECDSA cryptograpy, PIN codes, and biometric authentication (as available on your device) to keep your cash safe. Flash also runs a hybrid custody model to ensure that you can keep your cash safe and secure, since it is optional for you to have our custodian keep your funds. As the saying goes, 'not your keys, not your coins'.

For maximum security, we recommend that you store your cash in a self-custody wallet, and only you know the private key or seed phrase.

faq.question: How can I add cash to Flash?
faq.answer:
To add funds to Flash, you have multiple options:

  • Deposit physical dollars (or whatever medium of exchange is accepted) at one of the many Flash cash-in/cash-out locations.
  • Jump in our chatrooms and connect with a another Flash user willing send you digital cash exchange for dollars.
  • Receive Bitcoin directly to Flash from any other Lightning or Bitcoin application, from anywhere in the world. By default, Bitcoin is received and stored in your Cash(USD) wallet.

faq.question: Can I cash out from Flash?
faq.answer:
You have full control over your cash, so at any point you can choose to convert your digital cash in Flash to physical cash. You have multiple options:

  • Withdraw phyisical dollars from one of the many Flash cash-in/cash-out locations.
  • Jump in our peer-to-peer chatrooms and connect with a another Flash user willing to give you physical dollars for your digital cash.
An increasing number of businesss accept Flash, so consider using Flash directly to buy goods and services instead of paying transaction fees to convert to physical dollars.

faq.question: What are the transaction fees on Flash?
faq.answer:
Transaction fees vary depending on the type of transaction:

  • Flash to Flash: FREE
  • Flash to another Lightning app: 0.2%
  • Flash to a Bitcoin address: 0.5% + on-chain fees
  • Flash to a bank account: 2%
Cash-in/cash-out locations are considered Flash to Flash, but an additional fee may be assessed by Flash business locations.

faq.question: How does Flash Pay work?
faq.answer:
Anyone can use Flash to accept Bitcoin and Lightning payments by simply displaying a QR code when accepting payment. Businesses can use this QR code to accept payments directly, or they can use the Flash Pay Point-of-Sale (POS) system to accept payments.

To use Flash Pay, you enter the amount that you want to receive, and a QR code will be generated. Then the customer scans the QR code with Flash, and the payment is sent instantly to your Flash. The screen will show a confirmation that the payment was received, and the customer will receive a notification that the payment was sent. Your customers can use any Bitcoin or Lightning app to pay you, and they can pay from anywhere in the world.

The Flash POS webapp is also available for free to accept payments, and can be used on any device with a web browser. The Flash POS app can be found here. (Coming Soon)

faq.question: What is Flash Business?
faq.answer:
Flash Business allows you to earn additional revenue by providing cash-in and cash-out services to your customers. With Flash Business, you can earn a small fee on every cash-in or cash-out transaction, and your earnings can be withdrawn to your bank account at any time, or kept on Flash for spending. With Flash Business, you will be listed on the Flash Map for free to promote your business to Flash users.

Contact us to get more information about setting up a Flash business account.

faq.question: How is Flash different from a bank account?
faq.answer:
While traditional bank accounts and Flash share some similarities, there are several key differences.

  • Flash is global, so you can send and receive cash from anywhere in the world, instantly.
  • Flash is cryptographically secure, making it virtually impossible for anyone to access your cash without your permission.
  • Flash is more private, as you donâ€™t need to provide any personal information to use it.
Its important to note that with freedom comes responsibility. All cash you store on Flash is your responsibility, so make sure to keep your device PIN secure. Cash stored on Flash is not insured by the FDIC or other governmental insurance bodies.

Treat Flash like the cash in your pocket; we recommend that you only store as much cash on Flash as you would carry in your pocket. Larger amounts of cash should be stored in a self-custody wallet, and only you should know the private key or seed phrase.

faq.question: How do I backup Flash on my device?
faq.answer:
Flash is a hybrid custodial wallet, so your backups on your Cash(USD) wallet are automatically encrypted and stored. However, the Bitcoin in your BTC wallet is completely under your control, and you will need to secure the backup yourself. In order to restore your wallet in the event that you lose your device, you will to follow our restore process and provide your phone number or email address. For your BTC wallet we strongly recommend writing down your backup phrase and storing it in a secure place as soon as possible.

IMPORTANT: If you lose your device and do not have your backup phrase, you will not be able to restore your BTC wallet and your cash will be lost. Treat your Flash BTC wallet like your savings account, and your Cash(USD) wallet like the cash in your pocket; we recommend that you only store as much cash on Flash as you would carry in your pocket.

faq.question: Can I use Flash even if I don't have any experience with Bitcoin?
faq.answer:
Absolutely!

Flash is designed to be user-friendly and is suitable for people wanting to use digital cash that know nothing about Bitcoin, and for experienced Bitcoin users, and everyone in between.

We provide in-app guides and learning modules, and we are availabe using the chat feature in the app to answer any questions you may have. (Coming Soon)
